availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Lewis Sallee (Wayne County, KY, farmer and state rep 1850)

body.p: Wayne County, Kentucky, farmer and politician. Wayne County native. Son of Charity Van Winkle Sallee and Peter Sallee. Member of the House of Representatives of the Commonwealth of Kentucky in 1850. Farmer in Wayne County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Wayne County, Districts 1 and 6, p. 31.
Lewis Collins and Richard H. Collins, Collins' Historical Sketches of Kentucky, vol. 2 (Covington, KY: Collins & Co., 1874), 754.
Find A Grave, "John L Sallee (1813-1886)," Memorial #39144640, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/39144640/sal (accessed April 28, 2017).
